post.title: samsung vibrant galaxy s unlocked att/t-mobile/winds/rogers/mobilicity/bell 2g,3g
post.content: hello, i am selling a used, unlocked samsung galaxy s in a very good condition. i don't need to say it over and over again that this phone works great on 2g,3g network from many wireless carriers in north america. the packages including: - the samsung galaxy phone - battery - 2 gb micro sd card - wall charger - usb data cable - earphones - extra battery cover - micro sd card adaptor - user guide - box $365 shipped to u.s and $385 shipped to canada
